about:
Hello i am **Fathur Ramadhan**, 


I am fresh graduate in Computer Network Engineering Vocational High Schools, with a strong understanding of Networking and System Administration, i am very passionate about this field because i love what i do, i have a steady source of motivation that drives me to do my best. This passion led me to challenge myself daily and learn new skills that helped me to do better work. For example, i keep learn something new about Networking using hardware or software that required and don't forget about System Administration, sometimes i try to create server that provide services for client.
